DOC.brief_summary: This investigation targets either the patients of 18 years-old or older and under 65 years-old with organic or mixed erectile dysfunction (ED) who cannot obtain sufficient efficacy by dose 10mg of Levitra, and the target patients dose is increased to Levitra 20mg. This investigation will be limited to the patients whose tolerability of Levitra 10mg is judged to be no problem.
DOC.criteria: This investigation targets either the patients of 18 yearsold or older and under 65 yearsold with organic or mixed erectile dysfunction who cannot obtain sufficient efficacy by dose 10mg of Levitra, and the target patients dose is increased to Levitra 20mg. This investigation will be limited to the patients whose tolerability of Levitra 10mg is judged to be no problem.
